Attributes.description: Study of one influential modern Chinese author, such as Lu Xun, Shen Congwen, Eileen Chang, Yu Hua, Mo Yan, or Wang Anyi.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Restricted to fourth-year students. A minimum of 9 credits of 300-level ASIA coursework recommended.)
